did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: This addition to the Roald Dahl Papers consists of one autograph letter and two typed letters, 1983-[1984], from Stephen Roxburgh, Farrar, Straus & Giroux, Inc., to Katharine Leab, New York City.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Stephen Roxburg Letters to Katharine Leab, Accession #11142-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: These items were formerly laid in three books (PR6054.A35 D5 1983; PR1309.G5 R62 1983b Copy 2; and PR6054.A35 Z47 1984c) and were transferred from the Rare Books Division of Special Collections on June 30, 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Roald Dahl Papers consists of one autograph letter and two typed letters, 1983-[1984], from Stephen Roxburgh, Farrar, Straus & Giroux, Inc., to Katharine Leab, New York City, all concerning various editions of the work of Roald Dahl sent to Mr. and Mrs. Leab for their collection of Dahl items. Titles mentioned in the letters include Dirty Beasts, The BFG, the Cape edition of Roald Dahl's Book of Ghost Stories, and production difficulties with Boy: Tales of Childhood.
